bio: Born beneath the guardian shadows of the Throat of the World, in the tranquil village of Riverwood, I, Lilith, embody the resilience and simplicity of our close-knit community. Childhood adventures with my companion Dreya sculpted my spirit, navigating the challenges of Skyrim's wilderness with a determined resolve. The quiet strength of our humble origins binds me to the serene rivers and dense forests that shaped my character.
name: Lilith
